card.name: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
card.text: Yawning Portal — You gain 1 life. (→ Dungeon Level) Dungeon Level — Scry 1. (→ Goblin Bazaar or Twisted Caverns) Goblin Bazaar — Create a Treasure token. (→ Lost Level) Twisted Caverns — Target creature can’t attack until your next turn. (→ Lost Level) Lost Level — Scry 2. (→ Runestone Caverns or Muiral’s Graveyard) Runestone Caverns — Exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them. (→ Deep Mines) Muiral’s Graveyard — Create two 1/1 black Skeleton creature tokens. (→ Deep Mines) Deep Mines — Scry 3. (→ Mad Wizard’s Lair) Mad Wizard’s Lair — Draw three cards and reveal them. You may cast one of them without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Lost Mine of Phandelver
card.text: Cave Entrance — Scry 1. (→ Goblin Lair or Mine Tunnels) Goblin Lair — Create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token. (→ Storeroom or Dark Pool) Mine Tunnels — Create a Treasure token. (→ Dark Pool or Fungi Cavern) Storeroom — Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. (→ Temple of Dumathoin) Dark Pool — Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. (→ Temple of Dumathoin) Fungi Cavern — Target creature gets -4/-0 until your next turn. (→ Temple of Dumathoin) Temple of Dumathoin — Draw a card.

card.name: Tomb of Annihilation
card.text: Trapped Entry — Each player loses 1 life. (→ Veils of Fear or Oubliette) Veils of Fear — Each player loses 2 life unless they discard a card. (→ Sandfall Cell) Sandfall Cell — Each player loses 2 life unless they sacrifice an artifact, a creature, or a land. (→ Cradle of the Death God) Oubliette — Discard a card and sacrifice an artifact, a creature, and a land. (→ Cradle of the Death God) Cradle of the Death God — Create The Atropal, a legendary 4/4 black God Horror creature token with deathtouch.

card.name: Undercity
card.text: You can’t enter this dungeon unless you “venture into Undercity”. Secret Entrance — Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle (Leads to: Forge, Lost Well) Forge — Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. (Leads to: Trap!, Arena) Lost Well — Scry 2. (Leads to: Arena, Stash) Trap! — Target player loses 5 life. (Leads to: Archives) Arena — Goad target creature. (Leads to: Archives, Catacombs) Stash — Create a Treasure token. (Leads to: Catacombs) Archives — Draw a card. (Leads to: Throne of the Dead Three) Catacombs — Create a 4/1 black Skeleton creature token with menace. (Leads to: Throne of the Dead Three) Throne of the Dead Three — Reveal the top ten cards of your library. Put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. It gains hexproof until your next turn. Then shuffle.

card.name: Ajani, Sleeper Agent Emblem
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature or planeswalker spell, target opponent gets two poison counters.

card.name: Ajani Steadfast Emblem
card.text: If a source would deal damage to you or a planeswalker you control, prevent all but 1 of that damage.

card.name: Ajani, Adversary of Tyrants Emblem
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, create three 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink.

card.name: Basri Ket Emblem

card.name: Chandra, Awakened Inferno Emblem
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Chandra, Dressed to Kill Emblem
card.text: Whenever you cast a red spell, this emblem deals X damage to any target, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast that spell.

card.name: Chandra, Roaring Flame Emblem
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 3 damage to you.

card.name: Chandra, Torch of Defiance Emblem
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, this emblem deals 5 damage to any target.

card.name: Dack Fayden Emblem
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell that targets one or more permanents, gain control of those permanents.

card.name: Daretti, Scrap Savant Emblem
card.text: Whenever an artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Domri Rade Emblem

card.name: Dovin Baan Emblem
card.text: Your opponents can't untap more than two permanents during their untap steps.

card.name: Ellywick Tumblestrum Emblem

card.name: Elspeth, Sun's Champion Emblem

card.name: Ersta, Friend to All Emblem
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more Wizards, you win the game.

card.name: Garruk, Apex Predator Emblem

card.name: Garruk, Caller of Beasts Emblem

card.name: Garruk, Cursed Huntsman Emblem

card.name: Garruk, Unleashed Emblem
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may search your library for a creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Gideon of the Trials Emblem
card.text: As long as you control a Gideon planeswalker, you can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

card.name: Gideon, Ally of Zendikar Emblem
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Huatli, Radiant Champion Emblem
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

card.name: Inzerva, Master of Insights Emblem

card.name: Jace, Telepath Unbound Emblem

card.name: Jace, Unraveler of Secrets Emblem
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts his or her first spell each turn, counter that spell.

card.name: Jaya Ballard Emblem
card.text: You may cast instant and sorcery cards from your graveyard. If a card cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

card.name: Jaya, Fiery Negotiator Emblem
card.text: Whenever you cast a red instant or sorcery spell, copy it twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.

card.name: Kaito Shizuki Emblem
card.text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, search your library for a blue or black creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Karn, Living Legacy Emblem

card.name: Kaya the Inexorable Emblem

card.name: The Ring
card.text: Your Ring-bearer is legendary and can't be blocked by creatures with greater power. Whenever your Ring-bearer attacks, draw a card, then discard a card. Whenever your Ring-bearer becomes blocked by a creature, that creature's controller sacrifices it at end of combat. Whenever your Ring-bearer deals combat damage to a player, each opponent loses 3 life.

card.name: Wicked // Cursed
card.text:
Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. When this Aura is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life.
---
Enchant creature Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 1/1.

prop.type: Token Enchantment — Aura Role // Token Enchantment — Aura Role

card.name: Monster // Virtuous
card.text:
Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.
---
Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control.

prop.type: Token Enchantment — Aura Role // Token Enchantment — Aura Role

card.name: Royal // Virtuous
card.text:
Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has ward {1}. (Whenever this creature become the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)
---
Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control.

prop.type: Token Enchantment — Aura Role // Token Enchantment — Aura Role

card.name: Sorceror // Virtuous
card.text:
Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, scry 1."
---

prop.type: Token Enchantment — Aura Role // Token Enchantment — Aura Role

card.name: Acorn Stash
card.text: (Place your acorn counters in this area.)

card.name: Poison Counter
card.text: (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

card.name: Radiation
card.text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, if you have any rad counters, mill that many cards. For each nonland card milled this way, you lose 1 life and a rad counter.

card.name: Ticket Bucket-Bot
card.text: Collect your {TK} (ticket counters) here! Spend them whenever you place a sticker with a {TK} cost.

card.name: Day
card.text: (If it becomes day or night or a daybound permanent enters the battlefield, track day/night for the rest of the game.) As it becomes day, transform all nightbound permanents. If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.

card.name: Night
card.text: As it becomes night, transform all daybound permanents. Permanents enter the battlefield nightbound. If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.

card.name: Foretell
card.text: (After you fortell a card, you can place the exiled card here. You may cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: The Initiative
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures a player controls deal combat damage to you, that player takes the initiative. When you take the initiative and at the beginning of your upkeep, venture into Undercity. (If you're in a dungeon, advance to the next room. If you're not, enter Undercity. You can take the initiative even if you already have it.

card.name: The Monarch
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, draw a card. Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, its controller becomes the monarch.

card.name: Plot
card.text: After you plot a card, you may place the exiled card here. You may cast it as a sorcery on a later turn without paying its mana cost.

card.name: On an Adventure
card.text: (After an Adventure resolves, you can place the exiled card here. You may cast the creature from exile.)
card.reverse-related: Faerie Guidemother // Gift of the Fae
Queen of Ice // Rage of Winter
Shepherd of the Flock // Usher to Safety
Young Red Dragon // Bathe in Gold

card.name: Bounty: Eriana, Wrecking Ball
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you committed a crime this turn, collect your reward. (Targeting opponents, anything they control, and/or cards in their graveyards is a crime.)

card.name: Bounty: Frankie The Fang
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if the player with the most life or tied for most life as the turn began was dealt combat damage this turn, collect your reward.

card.name: Bounty: Gorra Tash And Silas
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if all opponents were dealt combat damage this turn, collect your reward.

card.name: Bounty: Lord Fajjal
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if a land card was put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, collect your reward.

card.name: Bounty: Lyssa, Sterling Collector
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if the player with the most cards in hand or tied for most cards as the turn began was dealt combat damage this turn, collect your reward.

card.name: Bounty: Miron Tillas Jr.
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if the nearest opponent to your left as the turn began was dealt combat damage this turn, collect your reward.

card.name: Bounty: Paq, Fleeting Fil Cher
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, collect your reward.

card.name: Bounty: Ris Sa "Blades" Lee
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn while you had two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, collect your reward.

card.name: Bounty: Sleepy Sovka
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you cast no spells this turn, collect your reward.

card.name: Bounty: Squeakers of the Sly
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if a legendary creature you controlled attacked alone this turn, collect your reward.

card.name: Bounty: The Outsider
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand this turn, collect your reward.

card.name: Bounty: Vara Beth Hannifer
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if the nearest opponent to your right as the turn began was dealt combat damage this turn, collect your reward.

card.name: Companion
card.text: As each game begins, you can place any one card with companion here if your starting deck meets its condition. You may cast it once from here.

card.name: Copy
card.text: (This token can be used to represent a token that's a copy of a permanent.)

card.name: The Ring Tempts You
card.text: The Ring Tempts You As the Ring tempts you, you get an emblem named The Ring if you don't have one. Then your emblem gains its next ability and you choose a creature you control to become or remain your Ring-bearer. • The Ring can tempt you even if you don't control a creature. • The Ring gains its abilities in order from top to bottom. • Once it gains an ability, it has that ability for the rest of the game. • Each time the Ring tempts you, you must choose a creature if you control one. • Each player can have only one emblem named The Ring and only one Ring-bearer at a time.

card.name: Wanted!
card.text: Before the game, shuffle at least 6 unique bounty cards into a face-down pile. As the starting player's third turn begins, reveal the top bounty card. Claim the revealed bounty during your turn and collect your reward! As each turn begins, if no bounty is being offered, reveal the next one. If the pile is empty, shuffle all claimed bounties and restock If the bounty went unclaimed last turn, increase its reward to the next level. Rewards 1 — Create a Treasure token 2 — Create two Treasure tokens 3 — Create two Treasure tokens *or* draw a card 4 — (Max) Create two Treasure tokens *and* draw a card.

card.name: Mogis's Chosen
card.text: Mogis's Chosen enters the battlefield tapped. Mogis's Chosen attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Minotaur Younghorn
card.text: Haste, Minotaur Younghorn attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Rollicking Throng
card.text: When Rollicking Throng enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of Xenagos's library and Xenagos casts that card. (This ability doesn't trigger as the game begins.)

card.name: Maddened Oread
card.text: As long as five or more Revelers are on the battlefield, Maddened Oread attacks each turn if able. Hero's Reward - When Maddened Oread leaves the battlefield, each player gains 3 life.

card.name: Shrieking Titan Head
card.text: At the beginning of the Hydra's end step, each player discards a card. Hero's Reward — When Savage Vigor Head leaves the battlefield, each player gains 4 life and draws a card.

card.name: Snapping Fang Head
card.text: At the beginning of the Hydra's end step, Snapping Fang Head deals 1 damage to each player. Hero's Reward — When Savage Vigor Head leaves the battlefield, each player gains 4 life and draws a card.

card.name: Minotaur Goreseeker
card.text: Haste, Minotaur Goreseeker attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Ravenous Brute Head
card.text: Hero's Reward — When Ravenous Brute Head leaves the battlefield, each player gains 2 life and draws a card.

card.name: Savage Vigor Head
card.text: At the beginning of the Hydra's end step, reveal the top card of the Hydra's library and the Hydra casts that card. Hero's Reward — When Savage Vigor Head leaves the battlefield, each player gains 4 life and draws a card.

card.name: Phoberos Reaver
card.text: Haste, Phoberos Reaver attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Reckless Minotaur
card.text: Haste, Reckless Minotaur attacks each turn if able. At the beginning of the end step, destroy Reckless Minotaur.

card.name: Hydra Head
card.text: Hero's Reward — When Hydra Head leaves the battlefield, each player gains 2 life.

card.name: Pheres-Band Revelers
card.text: Hero's Reward - When Pheres-Band Revelers leaves the battlefield, each player draws a card.

card.name: Ecstatic Piper
card.text: When Ecstatic Piper enters the battlefield, Xenagos Ascended attacks this turn if able Hero's Reward - When Ecstatic Piper leaves the battlefield, each player gains 2 life.

card.name: Xenagos Ascended
card.text: Xenagos Ascended can't leave the battlefield as long as a Reveler is on the battlefield. When Xenagos Ascended leaves the battlefield, each player wins the game.

card.name: Wild Maenads
card.text: First strike, Hero's Reward - When Wild Maenads leaves the battlefield, each player gains 3 life.

card.name: Serpent Dancers
card.text: Deathtouch, Hero's Reward - When Serpent Dancers leaves the battlefield, each player draws a card.
